definition: Leningrad, name of Russian city Saint Petersburg 聖彼得堡|圣彼得堡 1923-1991
Leninism

sentences.english: Which indeed is approved by Marxism- Leninism?
sentences.chinese: 馬克思列寧主義到底贊成哪一個呢？

sentences.english: Lenin went up to the house and saw the bee-keeper.
sentences.chinese: 列寧走到房子旁見到了養蜂人。

sentences.english: The ideas of Marxism-Leninism point the way to victory.
sentences.chinese: 馬克思列寧主義思想指引著通向勝利的道路。

sentences.english: Its theory and practice have been codified in the canon of Leninism.
sentences.chinese: 它的理論和實踐都根據列寧主義原則進行彙編整理。

sentences.english: In the book Lenin gave a profound analysis of the struggle inside the Party.
sentences.chinese: 在這本書裏，列寧深入地分析了黨內鬥爭。

sentences.english: That is, the thought of cooperativeness initiated by Lenin.
sentences.chinese: 這就是列寧首創的合作制思想。

sentences.english: To borrow an expression of Lenin’s, we were useful idiots.
sentences.chinese: 借用列寧的話說，我們不過是“有用的白癡”。

sentences.english: A farewell in Leningrad, in the spring of 1942.
sentences.chinese: 1942年春天，在列寧格勒的一場送別儀式。

sentences.english: He became a Hero of Socialist Labor (1975) and was twice awarded the Order of Lenin.
sentences.chinese: 年獲社會主義勞動英雄稱號，兩次獲得列寧勳章。

sentences.english: It's bad enough that Vladimir Lenin's eponymous city is St.
sentences.chinese: 列寧以其名字命名的城市現在又恢復聖彼得堡的舊名。

sentences.english: The discovery of Lenin\'s statue might be a foreshadowing of some distant future discovery at the North Pole.
sentences.chinese: 這尊列寧雕像，或許預示着遙遠的將來在北極的發現。

sentences.english: Patties made from minced human flesh were on sale at the Leningrad Haymarket .
sentences.chinese: 列寧格勒秣市場上出售的小餡餅，就是以碎人肉作餡。

sentences.english: Lev Davidovich Bronstein. Leader, with V. I. Lenin, of the Russian Revolution.
sentences.chinese: 列寧一起，領導了俄國革命，紅軍的建立者。

sentences.english: The Chinese people came into contact with Marxism-Leninism after the may Fouth movement.
sentences.chinese: 中國人民在五四運動後開始接觸到馬克思列寧主義。

sentences.english: "The Paris Commune, " said Lenin, "was the first step.
sentences.chinese: “巴黎公社，”列寧說，“邁出了第一步。”
